types.html:
hélico m (plural hélicos)

  1. (colloquial) chopper, helicopter
    • 2023, “Il Pleut Sur Notre Dame”, performed by Chilly Gonzales & Bonnie Banane:
      D'où tombent les gargouilles en bas relief / Où est, où est Casimodo ? Est-il parti en hélico ?
      Where do the gargoyles in bas-relief fall from / Where is, where is Casimodo? Did he leave by helicopter?

title: hélico
pronunHtml: • (mute h) IPA(key): /e.li.ko/
